SEARCH
Package com.example.yellow.organizers

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.yellow.organizers.Event
public class Event extends Object
This class represents an Event object that is stored in Firestore.

    • getFormattedDateAndLocation

      public String getFormattedDateAndLocation()
      Builds a small readable string like "Nov 05, 2025 @ Edmonton" If the date or location is missing, it only shows the available part
      Returns:
      formatted string with date and location

    • toMap

      public Map<String,Object> toMap()
      Converts the event into a map of key-value pairs for writing to Firestore.

      This method skips the document ID (using Exclude) because Firestore handles it automatically.

      Returns:
      map of field names and their values
